name: heatingTemperature_setValue
description: This function is used to set the heating temperature of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the heating temperature.

parameters.name: predefinedHeatingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the predefined heating temperature.

parameters.name: heatingTemperature
parameters.description: The value of the heating temperature to set.
